net.bytebuddy.pool

接口 TypePool.Default.ComponentTypeLocator

  • 所有已知实现类:
    TypePool.Default.ComponentTypeLocator.ForAnnotationProperty, TypePool.Default.ComponentTypeLocator.ForArrayType, TypePool.Default.ComponentTypeLocator.Illegal
    封闭类:
    TypePool.Default

    protected static interface TypePool.Default.ComponentTypeLocator
    A component type locator allows for the lazy location of an array's component type.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  TypePool.Default.ComponentTypeLocator.ForAnnotationProperty
      A component type locator that lazily analyses an annotation for resolving an annotation property's array value's component type.
      static class  TypePool.Default.ComponentTypeLocator.ForArrayType
      A component type locator that locates an array type by a method's return value from its method descriptor.
      static class  TypePool.Default.ComponentTypeLocator.Illegal
      A component type locator which cannot legally resolve an array's component type.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      TypePool.AbstractBase.RawDescriptionArray.ComponentTypeReference bind(String name)
      Binds this component type to a given property name of an annotation.

    • 方法详细资料

      • bind

        TypePool.AbstractBase.RawDescriptionArray.ComponentTypeReference bind(String name)
        Binds this component type to a given property name of an annotation.
        参数:
        name - The name of an annotation property which the returned component type reference should query for resolving an array's component type.
        返回:
        A component type reference to an annotation value's component type.
